biotools.summary:
Knowledgebase of tissue-specific functional annotation and trait association of long noncoding RNA.

Scripts for analyzing data displayed and deposited on the long non-coding RNA knowledgebase (lncRNAKB).

LncRNAKB is an invaluable resource to understand the biological importance of long non-coding RNA (lncRNA) in tissue-specificity and disease association.

bioschemas.name: lncRNAKB
